type.name: DicerConfig
type.prop: This is the boundary used to detect the beginning of a new part.
If true, preamble header parsing will be performed first.
The maximum number of header key=>value pairs to parse.

type.name: Dicer
type.prop: Sets the boundary to use for parsing and performs some initialization needed for parsing. You should only need to use this if you set `headerFirst` to true in the constructor and are parsing the boundary from the preamble header.
